Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute at 106th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are rerouted in both directions via Avenue O, 100th, Commercial, 104th and Torrence due to street blockage at 106th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Avenue O, 100th, Commercial, 104th and Torrence due to street blockage at 106th/Buffalo.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 71st/Paxton
ShortDescription: NB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffery and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffery and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/Paxton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted WB: Promontory Dr, South Shore Dr and 67th;EB: 67th, Jeffery, Marquette and Promontory Dr: due to, near 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/South Shore, due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Westbound buses will operate via Promontory Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette and Promontory Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
